role_description: An Ansible role that installs Hyper.js on nearly any platform and applies a sensible default configuration (including useful plugins)
role_description_full_overview: [Hyper](https://hyper.is/) is an electron-based terminal. It is written using web technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript etc. It looks very modern and has lots of customization options.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Hyper.js on nearly any platform and applies a sensible default configuration (including useful plugins).
